mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, N.* FROM (SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE NUM > 0 ORDER BY NUM DESC) N) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NUM, TITLE, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT, CONTENTS) VALUES(NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, 0, #{contents})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents} WHERE NUM = #{num}
